description: Instead of staying home and attending High School in Kyoto, Kyouko travels with her childhood friend Shou Fuwa to Tokyo to help him while he makes it big as an idol. When she finds out he only invited her so she could be his maid, her heart and innocence are shattered. More vengeful than depressed, she swears to avenge herself. Shou comments the only way to do this would be to beat him in show business, so that`s what she decides to do. She changes her hair style and begins the task of applying to Shou`s rival company (Akatoki Agency), L.M.E.
name: Mogami Kyouko
